Home Browse Effects Docs

Effects by category

  • Compressors - Dynamics processing functions
  • Digital Delay - Echo like functions
    • Basic digital delay
      Basic digital delay effect where pots control feedback and delay length
    • Digital delay with pitch shift in feedback loop
      This is a basic digital delay has a pitch shifter inserted into the feedback loop so the echoes either increase or decrease in pitch.
    • Cascaded digital filter delay
      Multiple digital delays that are time synchronized that run through various filters
  • Distortion-based effects - Distortion effects
    • Distortion with dropped octave bass
      This is a distortion effect which also includes a dropped octave bass note.
  • Envelope filter effects - Effects that use the envelope of the signal as a parameter (like an auto-wah)
    • Basic_auto_wah
  • Looper Effects - Capture and playback loops and synchronize other effects to the loop length
    • Looper With Echo
    • Looper With Synth Fx
  • Slicer-based effects - Effects that use the slicer module to rhymically chop the signal up and send it through different effects
    • Slicer_filter
  • Synth Effects - Effects that use the synth and shaper modules to create synth sounds from guitars and bases
    • Basic_shaper
    • Shaper Synth Out Phased
  • Tremelo effects - Tremelo effects (amplitude modulation)
    • Harmonic_tremelo
  • Variable Delay Effects - Effects which gently vary the delay to create flagers, phasers and choruses
    • Rich Chorus
